channel.title: Recursive SNARKs on Blackpaper
channel.description: Recent content in Recursive SNARKs on Blackpaper

item.title: Recursive SNARKs and Pairing friendly Elliptic Curves
item.description: In recent years, SNARKs proliferated themselves as a potential privacy and scaling solution for permissionless blockchains. However, due to the complexity of underlying cryptography and mathematical constructions, SNARKs are hard to grasp for application oriented computer scientists and hardware developers.
